name: Zombie Night Terror

files.game: N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer (zombie_night_terror_en_1_3_8_16452.sh)

execute.description: Extracting game data, it may take a while...

content:
exe: Game/start.sh
files:
- game: 'N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer (zombie_night_terror_en_1_3_8_16452.sh)'
- unzip: http://lutris.net/files/tools/unzip.tar.gz
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $unzip
- execute:
    args: $game -d "$GAMEDIR" "data/noarch/*"
    description: Extracting game data, it may take a while...
    file: $CACHE/unzip
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Game
    src: $GAMEDIR/data/noarch
